s.text: LanaiÕs upcountry, very upscale resort is appointed like an Old English estate, with writing desks, four-poster beds, library, music room.

Nearly at the end of a winding road to the Na Pali Coast, these condominium units are beginning to show their age, but they come with complete kitchens, a white-sand beach with tide pools, and looming mountain peaks out of Bali Hai.
The Chalet Kilauea, the hub of this little empire, serves gourmet breakfasts and afternoon teas.
The Chalet Kilauea, the hub of this little empire, serves gourmet breakfasts and afternoon teas.
